snippet: A look at some of the highlights, lowlights and scarier happenings taking place at the annual RSA security conference this week.
abstract: A look at some of the highlights, lowlights and scarier happenings taking place at the annual RSA security conference this week.

headline.main: Security Event Features Fearmongers, Buzzwords and a Love for Anonymous
headline.print_headline: Warnings And Buzzwords At Security Event
